work.title: Technical Intern
work.description1: Wrote a Perl script that automated the retrieval of asset data (gateway, software, and networking information) from numerous servers.
work.description2: Wrote a Perl script that integrated the asset data with the company’s CMDB database to create a single source of truth for all information associated with every node associated with the CMDB.
work.description3: Contributed to the creation of a Python webcrawler that searches the web for information on competing company products.

work.title: Database Entry, Co-Op
work.company: The Right Thing - An ADP Company
work.description1: Processed incoming (mailed-in) I-9s for multiple companies to be automatically processed electronically into their I-9 database.
work.description2: Converted 80 – 120 scanned I-9s daily from the I-9 database to electronic I-9s and transferred them to a database synced between The Right Thing and the respected companies.
work.description3: Completed independent projects that involved searching/researching through the synced database for employee forms and information.

awards.title: Secretary of the Association of Computing Machinery
awards.description: Assisted in teaching ACM club of roughly 26 students about raspberry pi and arranged groups to work on projects associating it.

awards.title: Co-Founder of The Game Design and Production Club
awards.description: Recruited other enthusiastic students for production of mods and games.

awards.title: Lead Graphic Designer of Enactus
awards.description: Designed a t-shirt logo for the club’s 5k run and organized a group of designers for the club’s fundraising coloring book.

awards.title: Captain of The University of Findlay Soccer Team
Great Lakes Intercollegiate Athletic Conference All-Academic Excellence
